import React from 'react' import { HexColorPicker } from 'react-colorful' import { RgbaStringColorPicker } from 'react-colorful' import { HslaStringColorPicker } from 'react-colorful' import { useState } from 'react' import SwatchDiv from './SwatchDiv' import SwatchPickerStyle from './SwatchPickerStyle' import { Row } from 'reactstrap' import chroma from 'chroma-js' const SwatchPicker = () => { const [color, setColor] = useState('#aabbcc') const [rgbaColor, setRgbaColor] = useState('rgb(255, 255, 255)') const [hslaColor, setHslaColor] = useState('hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 1)') const [colorFormat, setColorFormat] = useState('hex') const [colorsInSwatch, setColorsInSwatch] = useState([ { id: 1, color: '#19b582', swatch: 'one', }, { id: 2, color: '#1783bd', swatch: 'one', }, { id: 3, color: '#fbde06', swatch: 'one', }, { id: 4, color: '#8b9898', swatch: 'one', }, { id: 5, color: '#355670', swatch: 'one', }, ]) console.log(color) const addColor = () => { const id = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10000) + 1 const newColor = { id, color } setColorsInSwatch([...colorsInSwatch, newColor]) } const hexFormat = () => { setColorFormat('hex') setColor(chroma(color).hex()) } const rgbaFormat = () => { setColorFormat('rgba') } const hslaFormat = () => { setColorFormat('hsla') } return (
{colorFormat === 'hex' && ( <>

{color}

)} {colorFormat === 'rgba' && ( <>

{color}

)} {colorFormat === 'hsla' && ( <>

{color}

)}
{colorsInSwatch.map((color, index) => ( ))}

name (requited)

 ) } export default SwatchPicker
